name: Edelrid Finn III Harness - Children to Youths
description:
A sweet little harness for junior senders. It's great value and is fully adjustable, so it works for kis of differents sizes and accommodates growth too.Mesh padding and soft webbing add support and comfort.Waistbelt padding adjusts to keep tie-in points centred.Non-threading Slide Block buckles are safe and secure.

        Sustainability
